divs: sighting detailswatching a football game between cal vs. washington state on 10\13\2012 and on the 4:08 mark on the 4th quarter of the game when the "pac-12 news and notes" is shown during an injury time out - you will see on both sides of the screens that "we are not alone" - not unless fireworks or lights go sideways and up & down. quite fascinating! on the 4:10 mark - the right side of the screen, you will see the first visual....secondary visual will be seen on the left side of the screen around the 4:15 mark, you will see 2 orbs hovering and see one orb shooting in a high rate of speed. the video feed can be accessed on the pac12 network (via comcast cable). happy hunting :-)
Summary: Hovering lights at CAL vs. WAZU football game
